amendment.description: Amendment requires the United States Patent Trade Office to provide rules for the exchange of relevant information during the derivation proceedings.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in Part B of House Report 112-111 to direct the PTO to prescribe a requirement that parties provide sufficient evidence to prove and rebut a claim of derivation.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Speier amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.
